column5: One bedroom King Suite, queen size Futon/bed in main room for extra guest. Come relax, get away from the noise. This unit is fully separate and private. Perfect for a weekend getaway or if you're in town for a visit. It offers a kitchenette and a full bathroom equipped with jetted tub. Come enjoy the amazing views of Lake Travis, Located on a dead end street, it doesn't get better than this. Huge backyard for you and your four legged friends. Amenities: wifi, pool, BBQ grill, hammocks, parking.
